question:
Consider the following difference(s) between NITI Aayog and planning commission of India:
  1. NITI Aayog is more likely to focus on policy formulation and coordination, and less on fund allocation compared to planning commission
  2. While NITI Aayog has no provision for part-time members, planning commission had part time members
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Second statement is incorrect because NITI Aayog has provisions for part time members whereas planning commission had no provision for part time members.
